#include <iostream>
 
using namespace std;
 
int dp[102][102];
 
int min(int a, int b, int c)
{
    int mint = a;
    if (b < mint)
        mint = b;
    
    if (c < mint) 
        mint = c;
    return mint;
}
 
int main(void)
{
    int a[101], b[101];
    int t, lena, lenb, i, j;
    cin >> t;
    
    while (t--)
    {
        cin >> lena;        
        for (i = 0; i < lena; i++)
            cin >> a[i];
            
        cin >> lenb;
        for (i = 0; i < lenb; i++)
            cin >> b[i];    
            
        for (i = 0; i <= lena; i++)
            dp[0][i] = i;
        
        for (i = 1; i <= lenb; i++)
            dp[i][0] = i;
        
        for (i = 1; i <= lenb; i++)
        {
            for (j = 1; j <= lena; j++)
            {
                if (a[j - 1] == b[i - 1])
                {
                    dp[i][j] = dp[i - 1][j - 1];
                }
                else
                {
                    dp[i][j] = min(dp[i - 1][j - 1], dp[i - 1][j], dp[i][j - 1]) + 1;
                }
            }
        }
        
        cout << dp[lenb][lena] << endl;                
    }
    
    return 0;
}
